SELECT O.ORDER_NO,O.DELIVERY_NAME,O.DELIVERY_PHONE,O.DELIVERY_PHONE2,O.DELIVERY_PHONE3,O.ORDER_POST,O.ORDER_ROAD1, C.CART_NO,C.ORDER_NO,C.CART_ID, C.PRODUCT_NO, C.CART_AMOUNT, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_NAME,P.PRODUCT_THUMBIMG,P.PRODUCT_NO
FROM CART C ,PRODUCT P,ORDER_BASE O WHERE O.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO AND C.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO

SELECT O.ORDER_NO,O.DELIVERY_NAME,O.DELIVERY_PHONE,O.DELIVERY_PHONE2,O.DELIVERY_PHONE3,O.ORDER_POST,O.ORDER_ROAD1, C.ORDER_NO
FROM CART C ,ORDER_BASE O WHERE O.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO

SELECT O.ORDER_NO,O.GUEST_PW,O.ORDER_NAME,O.ORDER_PHONE,O.ORDER_PHONE2,O.ORDER_PHONE3, O.ORDER_EMAIL,O.ORDER_EMAIL2,O.DELIVERY_NAME,O.DELIVERY_PHONE, O.DELIVERY_PHONE2,O.DELIVERY_PHONE3,O.ORDER_POST,O.ORDER_ROAD1, C.CART_NO,C.ORDER_NO,C.CART_ID, C.PRODUCT_NO, C.CART_AMOUNT, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_NAME,P.PRODUCT_THUMBIMG,P.PRODUCT_NO
FROM CART C ,PRODUCT P,ORDER_BASE O WHERE C.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO AND O.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO AND O.ORDER_PHONE2 = #{param1} AND O.GUEST_PW = #{param2}

SELECT O.ORDER_NO,O.GUEST_PW,O.ORDER_NAME,O.ORDER_PHONE,O.ORDER_PHONE2,O.ORDER_PHONE3, O.ORDER_EMAIL,O.ORDER_EMAIL2,O.DELIVERY_NAME,O.DELIVERY_PHONE, O.DELIVERY_PHONE2,O.DELIVERY_PHONE3,O.ORDER_POST,O.ORDER_ROAD1, C.CART_NO,C.ORDER_NO,C.CART_ID, C.PRODUCT_NO, C.CART_AMOUNT, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_NAME,P.PRODUCT_THUMBIMG,P.PRODUCT_NO
FROM CART C ,PRODUCT P, ORDER_BASE O WHERE O.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO AND C.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO
ORDER BY O.ORDER_NO DESC
